snippet: Two years ago, some Fifth Down readers were appalled by New Orleans's play during its Super Bowl season. What penalties should Roger Goodell levy against the Saints and Gregg Williams?
abstract: Two years ago, some Fifth Down readers were appalled by New Orleans's play during its Super Bowl season. What penalties should Roger Goodell levy against the Saints and Gregg Williams?

headline.main: Looking Back at Complaints About Saints' Dirty Play
